name: Lift For Stairs
overview:
Lift For Stairs have years of experience of the UK’s best stair lift manufacturers. Lift For Stairs, is able to bring customers the best information, customer service and stair lift products available on the market.

Lift For Stairs Direct provide informative and helpful information about: curved stairlifts, straight stairlifts, disabled chair lifts, reconditioned stair lifts and stair lift rentals.

Products include: straight stairlifts, curved stairlifts, disabled chair lifts, rendonditioned and rental models and other mobility aids.
